# This is the US/English general help file for Open RTE.
#
[orte-rmcast-udp:msg-too-large]
A multicast message that exceeds size limits is attempting to be sent:

  Process: %s
  Channel: %03d.%03d.%03d.%03d
  bytes: %d
  limit: %d

The message will not be sent - please revise your program.
